title: How To Protect Your Java Against Licensing Liability Risks
author: Jay Patel
description: With recent changes to Oracle’s Java license models, it is important to understand your risk and exposure if you run Oracle Java in your environment.
cntitle: 如何保护您的 Java 免受许可证责任风险
cndescription: 鉴于 Oracle 最近对 Java 许可模式的变更，了解在您的环境中运行 Oracle Java 的风险和暴露至关重要。
